title: Kaalen Demngal Men
lyrics_fulfulde:
Waaded

Na rantse da Allah, na rantse da Ubangiji,
Zan kasance tare da kai har abada.

Ko da duniya ta juya mini baya,
Ko da ruwan sama ya rufe fuskata,
Zan kasance tare da kai har abada.

Ko da rana ta daskare a tsakiyar sama,
Ko da taurari suka fadi daga sararin samaniya,
Zan kasance tare da kai har abada.

Ko da kowa ya juya mini baya,
Ko da abokai suka zubar da ni,
Zan kasance tare da kai har abada.

Na rantse da Allah, na rantse da Ubangiji,
Zan kasance tare da kai har abada.

Gimi Bappa Nasiru
lyrics_english:
Promise

I swear by God, I swear by the Lord,
I will be with you forever.

Even if the world turns its back on me,
Even if the rain covers my face,
I will be with you forever.

Even if the sun freezes in the middle of the sky,
Even if the stars fall from the universe,
I will be with you forever.

Even if everyone turns their back on me,
Even if friends abandon me,
I will be with you forever.

I swear by God, I swear by the Lord,
I will be with you forever.

Gimi Bappa Nasiru

title: Jombaajo
lyrics_fulfulde:
Soyayya

Soyayya ce ta fara,
Ta fara ne a zuciyata.

Ta fara ne a lokacin da na gan ka,
Na ji wani abu mai kyau a zuciyata.

Ta fara ne a lokacin da na ji muryarka,
Na ji wani abu mai dadi a zuciyata.

Ta fara ne a lokacin da na ga murmushinka,
Na ji wani abu mai haske a zuciyata.

Soyayya ce ta fara,
Ta fara ne a zuciyata.

Gimi Bappa Nasiru
lyrics_english:
Love

It is love that began,
It began in my heart.

It began when I saw you,
I felt something good in my heart.

It began when I heard your voice,
I felt something sweet in my heart.

It began when I saw your smile,
I felt something bright in my heart.

It is love that began,
It began in my heart.

Gimi Bappa Nasiru

title: Saanirgol
lyrics_fulfulde:
Alla torii-mi A joomu baawɗe
 Hinna nam inna am joomu booɗɗe

O hootoyii saare nde goonga hannde
ñalndere Jum'aare ñalnde Mawnde

Poofaali ɗaggi nde ngeendam timmi
Nayaɓre nde Colte jeyaaɗo yurmii

Suumaye Mawɓe ɗiɗaɓre Hijra
Kempe o waali ñawu e hoyra

Nguurndam maako cappanɗe jeego'o 
Ɓesdu e limgalji duuɓi jeego'o

Ñalaande o dilliti bernde tampii
Gonɗi e mbaaña gole e loppii

Naawol ɓooƴe o haɓdi mbangugol 
Laaɓuɗi duuɓi tati e ɓuutol

O waali e suudu ñawndordu ñalɗe
Hooti o jaɓɓiteteeɗo balɗe

Reedu e becce e naawa weetay
O hootay tagɗo mo ɓiɓɓe cooyay

Naasaande jemma o hooti ñawtordu 
weetani bimbi sunooji kultor

E heewi e ɓernde mi ɗon ɓadaaki
Sakko mi nannga atal heɓaaki.

Yahdu ndu jiisde awaaji jeenayi
Ɓeddu awaaji tati e daayii.

Jemma o hooraa FMC suudu
Ya'u e awƴa, Makaama wondu

Ɓe njottake Gombe e saa'i jemma
o rokkaa leeso o wallinaama

Cinndel am kadi jo''inaaka
nde neeɓooyi seɗɗa fu ngel ɗalaaka

Mi nodday Auwalu ɓiɗɗo geeto
mi nodday gaaji amin e nootoo

Kamɓe no ngondi e maako jemma
weetani bimbiire maayde maama

Nden kadi anndu-mi toon e balte
yonki kin saldori poople ƴeptee

Baawɗe ngalaaka tonaa e Alla
dawral walaaka tonaa e Alla

Ɓaawo mi juuli ɗiɗiije Jum'a
mi hooti to kuugal terɗe nde''aa

Cinndel am e jogaa e junngo
ngel fuɗɗiti iiduki noddo wonngo

Ƴeptumi ɗakku-mi nowru ñaamru
ɓernde e heewi kulol ba fowru

Bojji nanoy-mi ɗi Abdulqaadiri
anndini baasa ñawu ngu hoyrii

Terɗe e peewi lorii-mi saare
mi hoocoya booro mi dilla siire

Miɗon woya haa ɓaditii-mi yolnde
Ahmadu faami habar ko ɓernde 

Ɗaccu-mi debbo am siire Kebbi
njibbinnooɗo keccel e bimbi

Non kadi nanngu-mi yahdu jemma
gomɗi e mbaaña gite e lamma
Cinndel am kadi  heewi saanooɓe
woɓɓe mi nooto mi ɗacca woɓɓe

Nde weeti ñalawma njootii-mi Dukku
Jeenayi njamndi miɗon e Dukku
Sarde nde huuɓi ɗum juuli inna am
Wayyo Alla jurumɗum inna am

Cooyol neene walaa ba maagol
Naawol ɓernde gite e gomngol

Mi sooyii inna mo jam sawaaba
Jooni mi mawɗo mi relli baaba

O hooti to tagɗomo nder salaama
O ɗacccii jeego'o ɓiɓɓe maama

O taannii ɗuuɗɓe e njaatiraaɓe
Ɗakkake sappo e derɗiraaɓe

Neɗɗo e hoddira Alla hoddira
Hijju heɓaaka daliila torra

O niyyake hijjuno suudu Kaaba
Koroona haɗiino ndewooɓe Kaaba

Sarde nde ngiimi-mo sakitiinde
O ittii tammunde haa e ɓernde

Nde mbolwanmoo-mi habar hooseere
Nde Arfa o ndaari o yenji hoore 

Keɓtu-mi baasa saɗii o suuɗii
 turnu-mi hoore mi suuɗa gonɗi

Jooni nde weeti fu sey o torƴii
E ɓernde mi yejjitataa ko feƴƴii

Sarde mi sikka ba min mi hoyɗay
Mi fintay mi nodda mo haa min mbolday

Mi woowii-no nodduki cinndel bimbi
Mi sanna o barkiɗinam e bimbi

Jooni walaa ɗum ba weendu ɓeeɓi
Ko lutti fu ɗum miccitaaki duuɓi

O woodi habar mi danyiino kecco
O weltii o siidi ngel kempe yecco

Ka'a woni haala ka kaalumoo-mi
Ngaynootirka ka cuptoray-mi

Non kadi luttuɗi miccitaali
Sarde mi ƴoƴɗo e taali-taali

Ɓaawo mi mawni o elti yam min
Caahu e sumpo o holli yam min

Gikkuuji booɗɗi fuu kanko njaakay-mi
Kalluɗe kuuɗe fuu ɗaccoyay-mi
O jaɓɗo Ɗariiqa ka yimɓe Alla
Tijjaaninkeejo kulɗo Alla

Haa e o waali o yejjitaayi
O juula o tasboya haa o maayi

Caggal juuluki Jum'a mawnde
Yonki ki losti o keɓɗo fewnde

Alla torii-mi a joomu baawɗe
Hinna nam inna am joomu booɗɗe.
lyrics_english:
Love

It is love that began,
It began in my heart.

It began when I saw you,
I felt something good in my heart.

It began when I heard your voice,
I felt something sweet in my heart.

It began when I saw your smile,
I felt something bright in my heart.

It is love that began,
It began in my heart.

Gimi Bappa Nasiru

title: A Gooto
lyrics_fulfulde:
Aan woni arano, 
E yiɗde maa mi timminii,
E ɓernde am a bajjo gooto,
 a gooto.

E rewɓe aan tan maru-mi,
E yiɗde aan tan ngiɗu-mi,
E yahdu aan tan cuɓu-mi,
Mi weddi aan tan numu-mi,
E rewɓe fuu a hawtanaaka  goɗɗo,
A gooto a gooto.

E worɓe aan tan mi mari,
E yiɗde aan tan mi yiɗi,
E yahdu aan tan mi suɓi,
Mi weddi aan tan mi numi,
E worɓe fuu a hawtanaaka goɗɗo ,
 A gooto
A gooto.

E rewɓe aan woni arano,
E rewɓe aan woni ɗiɗaɓo,
E rewɓe aan woni tataɓo,
E rewɓe aan woni nayaɓo,
Nder rewɓe fuu a hawtanaaka lawlo, 
A gooto, 
A gooto,

Ko nanndi maa e fuuna fuu,
Mi temjinii e hiirna fuu,
Mi ndaari fommbinaare fuu,
Mi hooti haa e woyla fuu,
Ko hewti maa tagaaka debbo, 
A gooto, 
A gooto,

Giɗaaɗo am nde weeti fuu,
Ɗum hannde hawtu janngo fuu,
To hikka hewti mawri fuu,
Hoyeende haa e caate fuu,
Walaa ba aan e worɓe fuu a bajjo  a gooto,
A gooto 
A gooto, 

Cuɓaaɗo am nde weeti fuu,
To hannde hawtu janngo fuu,
Ɗum hikka hewti mawri fuu,
Hoyeende haa e caate fuu,
Walaa ba aan e rewɓe fuu a bajjo a gooto, 
A gooto a gooto.

Ɗowtanki maa mi saftataa,
Yeddanki maa mi waawataa,
Ko welnu maa mi aaccataa,
Ko mettu maa mi gollataa,
Nder yiɗde maa mi hawtanaayi gorko a gooto,
A gooto a gooto.

Kirip mi ommbi ɓernde am,
Ngam yiɗde maaɗa heewi yam,
Walaa to wonnde naata yam,
Mi maaɗa tan a yardo yam,
Horaano rewɓe munñitee o  bajjo o  gooto,
A gooto a gooto.
A yahra yam to ndillataa,
A yarna yam ko njarataa,
A ñaamña yam ko ñaamataa,
A wallinam to mbaalataa,
Hoolaare am to maaɗa tan a gooto a gooto,
A gooto a gooto.
To paa-mi fuu mi hoocete,
Ko cuune-ɗaa mi ñammnete,
Njaramji fuu mi yarnete,
Ko muuyu-ɗaa mi rokkete,
Ko njey-mi fuu ɗum aan jeyi a gooto o gooto,
A gooto a gooto.

Aan woni arano,
E yiɗde maa mi timminii,
E ɓernde am a bajjo gooto,
 A gooto.
lyrics_english:
Love

It is love that began,
It began in my heart.

It began when I saw you,
I felt something good in my heart.

It began when I heard your voice,
I felt something sweet in my heart.

It began when I saw your smile,
I felt something bright in my heart.

It is love that began,
It began in my heart.

Gimi Bappa Nasiru
